feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:24 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain changing to snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
